name: Atlantean Sword
description: Any ATK card you play deals an additional 6 damage and removes 1 round from 1 random BUF effect from the target. This BUF can only be gained once. If you already have this BUF, ATK for 18 damage.

immediateEffect.script: var existing = PlayerStatuses.FirstOrDefault(s => s.Name == "Atlantean Sword Equipped"); if (existing != null) { DealDamage(Opponent, 18); } else { Log(PlayerDisplayName + " equips the Atlantean Sword!"); }

hooks.OnDealDamage: Amount += 6; if (OpponentStatuses.Count > 0) { var randomBuff = OpponentStatuses[Rng.Next(OpponentStatuses.Count)]; randomBuff.RemainingDuration--; Log("Atlantean Sword reduces " + randomBuff.Name + " duration!"); }
